content: cute amigurumi bee that can be worked up in one evening made of worsted weight yarn with safety eyes and felt eye patches the end result is about 4 inches tall perfect last minute gift this is an altered version of the love bug pattern 1 bee pattern notes are included in love bug pattern **please note that this project contains small parts that are not suitable for children it s not meant as a toy for babies or small children ** 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/love-bug-amigurumi
